testInfo.name: Gesamtfragenkatalog zum Test „Leben in Deutschland“ und zum „Einbürgerungstest“

questions.germanQuestion: Welches Wappen gehört zum Bundesland Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.englishQuestion: Which coat of arms belongs to the state of Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.notes: The coat of arms of Schleswig-Holstein is a symbol of the state's history and identity.
questions.learningTechniques: Focus on identifying the unique elements of the Schleswig-Holstein coat of arms.

resources.description: Learn more about the coat of arms of Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Welches ist ein Landkreis in Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.englishQuestion: Which is a district (Landkreis) in Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.notes: The 'Nordfriesland' is a district located in the state of Schleswig-Holstein.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with the names of districts within Schleswig-Holstein, especially 'Nordfriesland.'

resources.description: Learn more about the districts in Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Für wie viele Jahre wird der Landtag in Schleswig-Holstein gewählt?
questions.englishQuestion: For how many years is the state parliament (Landtag) in Schleswig-Holstein elected?
questions.notes: The state parliament in Schleswig-Holstein is elected for a term of 5 years.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the term length for the Landtag in Schleswig-Holstein is 5 years, which aligns with most other German federal states.

resources.description: Learn more about the political system in Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Ab welchem Alter darf man in Schleswig-Holstein bei Kommunalwahlen wählen?
questions.englishQuestion: At what age can you vote in local elections in Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.notes: In Schleswig-Holstein, citizens can participate in local elections starting at the age of 16.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that 16 is the voting age for local elections in Schleswig-Holstein, allowing younger citizens to engage in their community's political process.

resources.description: Learn more about voting rights in Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Farben hat die Landesflagge von Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.englishQuestion: What are the colors of the state flag of Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.notes: The state flag of Schleswig-Holstein consists of the colors blue, white, and red.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember the blue, white, and red colors of Schleswig-Holstein's flag, which reflect the state's identity.

resources.description: Learn more about the flag of Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Wo können Sie sich in Schleswig-Holstein über politische Themen informieren?
questions.englishQuestion: Where can you get information on political topics in Schleswig-Holstein?

options.germanOption: beim / bei der Landesbeauftragten für politische Bildung
options.englishOption: at the State Commissioner for Civic Education

questions.notes: In Schleswig-Holstein, the 'Landesbeauftragten für politische Bildung' (State Commissioner for Civic Education) is the key institution for learning about political topics.
questions.learningTechniques: Focus on the role of the 'Landesbeauftragten für politische Bildung' in educating the public about political matters in Schleswig-Holstein.

resources.description: Learn more about the State Commissioner for Civic Education in Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.englishQuestion: The state capital of Schleswig-Holstein is called ...
questions.notes: The state capital of Schleswig-Holstein is Kiel, a city known for its maritime heritage and as the host of the annual Kiel Week, one of the largest sailing events in the world.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that Kiel is the capital of Schleswig-Holstein, a city with significant historical and cultural importance.

resources.description: Learn more about Kiel, the capital of Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.notes: Schleswig-Holstein is located in the northern part of Germany and is one of the country's 16 federal states.
questions.learningTechniques: Familiarize yourself with the geographical location of Schleswig-Holstein on a map of Germany.

resources.description: Learn more about the geography of Schleswig-Holstein.

questions.germanQuestion: Wie nennt man die Regierungschefin/den Regierungschef in Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.englishQuestion: What is the title of the head of government in Schleswig-Holstein?
questions.notes: The head of government in Schleswig-Holstein is called the 'Ministerpräsidentin' or 'Ministerpräsident,' a title equivalent to 'Minister-President.'
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that the title 'Ministerpräsident' is used for the heads of government in German federal states, including Schleswig-Holstein.

resources.description: Learn more about the role of the Minister-President in Germany.

questions.germanQuestion: Welche Ministerin/welchen Minister hat Schleswig-Holstein nicht?
questions.englishQuestion: Which minister does Schleswig-Holstein not have?
questions.notes: Schleswig-Holstein, like other German federal states, does not have a Foreign Minister ('Außenminister'), as foreign affairs are handled at the federal level.
questions.learningTechniques: Remember that federal states in Germany do not have foreign ministers, as foreign policy is the responsibility of the federal government.

resources.description: Learn more about the structure of state governments in Germany.
